hibernate-mapping.query: from MessageThread as thread where thread.id = :id
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select {thread.*} from PROFILE_MESSAGE_THREADS_T thread inner join (select max(msg.ID) as id from PROFILE_MESSAGES_T msg group by msg.MESSAGE_THREAD) messages on messages.ID = thread.ID where message.UUID_TO=:to order by DATE_POSTED desc
